review: very simple to set up and operate, I had prime for 2 years before utilizing the content...now I'm not sure what took me so long.
author: Andy Shirk

review: I have used my Fire TV Stick for a couple weeks...it's okay with great HD quality. The movies, TV shows are not too bad...
author: Larry Carlisle

review: Works well, easy to install and operate.
author: Joseph Mormando "Joe M"

review: Glad I purchased!  Using the stick more than watching cable TV.
author: ShashaD

review: Works great and includes all my favorite channels.
author: Melissa White

review: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!. Best purchase in a while!
author: Julie Fairweather

review: Skips all the time while on 50mbs internet
author: Mike

review: The Fire TV Stick is pretty slick. It was easy to install and operate. Bought it for my daughter and we are really happy with it so far. Make sure your TV has an HDMI input available. Works off wifi and videos and movies seem to play with little to no buffering (depending on internet speed). I would recommend this device.
author: Maxx Marriott

review: ALOT OF BANG FOR THE BUCK.
author: bob safford BOB SAFFORD
